attributes.action: Make the internet off limits to MPs
attributes.background: MPs have proven themselves wilfully ignorant, and out of touch when it comes to legislation regarding technology, specifically the internet. I propose creating a panel of technology experts, at least 50% chosen by leading technology firms; to oversee any future legislation effecting the internet.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
